resources.name: PM Prep Group
resources.description: Facebook group supporting individuals interested in Product Management recruiting.

resources.name: Ivey Product Society
resources.description: An alumni-run community of Ivey alumni and students helping people start and advance their careers in Product Management.

resources.name: Cracking the PM Interview
resources.description: Book covering details of the product manager interview process.

resources.name: Cracking the Coding Interview
resources.description: Book covering details of the technical interview process.

resources.name: Decode and Conquer
resources.description: Book dedicated to PM interview questions and potential answers.

resources.name: Swipe to Unlock
resources.description: Book that explains key technologies and business strategies, aimed at non-technical people.

resources.name: APM List
resources.description: Website that lists companies that hire entry-level (associate) or intern PM roles and their timelines.

resources.name: Breaking Into Tech
resources.description: External website with overviews of non-technical roles.
